tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE production_defects (
  defect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  defect_type VARCHAR(50),
  defect_description TEXT,
  production_line_id INT,
  defect_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE defect_analysis (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   defect_id INT NOT NULL,
   analysis_date DATE NOT NULL,
   improvement_areas TEXT,
   waste_reduction TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionLineDefects (
    defect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    defect_name VARCHAR(255),
    defect_category VARCHAR(255),
    defect_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionLineEntries (
    entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    entry_date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    quantity_produced INT,
    defect_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionLineProducts (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_category VARCHAR(255),
    product_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionLineWorkers (
    worker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    worker_name VARCHAR(255),
    worker_role VARCHAR(255),
    hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionLineAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_date DATE,
    area_for_improvement VARCHAR(255),
    waste_reduction_plan TEXT
)
